title: Vietnam, US firms sign MoUs on energy, AI, data centre
description: The MoUs include one on energy technology transfer signed by Vietnam's state oil firm PetroVietnam and Kellogg Brown & Root, LNG cooperation between PetroVietnam's unit PTSC and Excelerate Energy, and AI and data centre development between Sovico Group and Supermicro.
content: Vietnamese and US firms have signed memorandums of understanding (MoUs) to cooperate in energy, AI and a data centre, the Vietnamese government said Tuesday.
cleaned_content: vietnamese and us firms have signed memorandums of understanding mous to cooperate in energy ai and a data centre the vietnamese government said tuesday
